title: iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max taller displays and notch replacement corroborated in leaked panels
content:
In March, 9to5Mac exclusively reported that Apple was planning four iPhone 14 models without a mini version. In addition, the Pro models would feature a taller screen due to a new punch-hole + pill design replacing the notch. Now, it seems the iPhone 14 panels’ lineup has leaked.

more…

The post iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max taller displays and notch replacement corroborated in leaked panels appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: iPhone 14 Pro models could feature a taller screen due to a new punch-hole + pill design replacing the notch. Now, the panels have leaked.
